**2022-11-16 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons, @aclements, @julieqiu**

**Accepted**

- **bufio: allow terminating Scanner early cleanly without a final token or an error** [#56381](https://go.dev/issue/56381)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **crypto/ecdsa: add methods to convert keys to crypto/ecdh format** [#56088](https://go.dev/issue/56088)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **crypto/x509: add crypto/x509/rootcerts package and rootcerts tag to embed CA root certificates in program** [#43958](https://go.dev/issue/43958)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **encoding: add ScalarMarshaler and ScalarUnmarshaler** [#56235](https://go.dev/issue/56235)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **math/rand: deprecate Seed** [#56319](https://go.dev/issue/56319)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **net/http: add ServeFileFS, FileServerFS, NewFileTransportFS** [#51971](https://go.dev/issue/51971)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **path/filepath: add IsLocal** [#56219](https://go.dev/issue/56219)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **spec: disallow anonymous interface cycles** [#56103](https://go.dev/issue/56103)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **sync: add OnceFunc** [#56102](https://go.dev/issue/56102)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **syscall/js: add Scope function** [#56084](https://go.dev/issue/56084)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **x/tools/go/{analysis,packages}: expose TypeErrors \[]types.Error fields** [#54619](https://go.dev/issue/54619)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰

**Declined**

- **Go build constraint \`any\`** [#56749](https://go.dev/issue/56749)
  - declined as infeasible
- **embed: Allow remote resources to be embedded** [#56401](https://go.dev/issue/56401)
  - declined as infeasible
- **os/exec: add GODEBUG flag to print a line to STDERR for each command started** [#56301](https://go.dev/issue/56301)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
